Package aima.core.util.math.geom.shapes

Class TransformMatrix2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • aima.core.util.math.geom.shapes.TransformMatrix2D
  • public class TransformMatrix2D
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements a transformation matrix for two-dimensional geometry.
    This is based on the svg standard, but does not implement the skewX and skewY operations. See w3c® SVG TransformMatrix definition for more information about these matrices.
    Author:
    Arno von Borries, Jan Phillip Kretzschmar, Andreas Walscheid

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static TransformMatrix2D UNITY_MATRIX
      This is the unity/identity matrix:
      [ 1 0 0 ]
      [ 0 0 0 ]
      [ 0 0 1 ]

        y - the Y element of the translate.

        the new transform matrix.

      • inverse

        public TransformMatrix2D inverse()
        Calculates the inverse of this transformation matrix. See Wolfram mathworld for more information.
        Returns:
        The new transform matrix.

      • multiply

        public Point2D multiply​(Point2D point)
        Multiplies this transformation matrix with a given point.
        For a multiplication in two-dimensional Cartesian space the third field is set to 1: 
         [ x_new ]   [ a c e ]   [ x_old ]
 [ y_new ] = [ b d f ] * [ y_old ]
 [   1   ]   [ 0 0 1 ]   [   1   ]
        Parameters:
        point - the Point2D to be transformed by this matrix.
        Returns:
        the new transformed point.

      • equals

        public boolean equals​(TransformMatrix2D op2)
        Compares this matrix to another transformation matrix.
        Parameters:
        op2 - the TransformMatrix2D to be compared to this matrix.
        Returns:
        true if both matrices are identical.

      • equals

        public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object o)
        Compares this matrix to another object.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        o - the object to be compared to this matrix.
        Returns:
        true if the object is identical to this matrix.
